scripts.build:docker: docker compose up -d --build && docker builder prune -f && docker image prune -a -f

dependencies.apollo-server-express: Integration of Apollo Server with Express
dependencies.axios: Promise-based HTTP client for Node.js and browser
dependencies.dotenv: Loads environment variables from a .env file into process.env
dependencies.express: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js
dependencies.ffmpeg: Node.js wrapper for ffmpeg command-line tool
dependencies.ffmpeg-static: Static binaries of ffmpeg for Node.js applications
dependencies.ffprobe-static: Static binaries of ffprobe for Node.js applications
dependencies.fluent-ffmpeg: Fluent API for ffmpeg in Node.js
dependencies.graphql: Core library for GraphQL schemas, queries, and mutations
dependencies.graphql-upload: Middleware for handling file uploads in GraphQL
dependencies.nodemon: Utility that automatically restarts Node.js application on file changes
dependencies.stream: Utilities for working with streams in Node.js
dependencies.typeorm: Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) for TypeScript and JavaScript
dependencies.cors: CORS is a node.js package for providing a Connect/Express middleware that can be used to enable CORS with various options.
dependencies.lodash: Use to check data empty or sort array data and etc...
